item.title: R to @ThisisDavina: If I am walking home alone I am scared of all men. Because I don’t know who is bad and who might attack me. We literally can’t even trust police officers. You are so ignorant in your statements it’s worrying
item.dc:creator: @girlsonfilmldn
item.description: If I am walking home alone I am scared of all men. Because I don’t know who is bad and who might attack me. We literally can’t even trust police officers. You are so ignorant in your statements it’s worrying

item.title: R to @jamieoliver: Is this it? This is the only tweet you can do? I thought you cared about children’s health. Where is your outrage????? WHAT ARE YOU DOING ABOUT IT??? You have the platform to make a big difference and you aren’t.
item.dc:creator: @girlsonfilmldn
item.description: Is this it? This is the only tweet you can do? I thought you cared about children’s health. Where is your outrage????? WHAT ARE YOU DOING ABOUT IT??? You have the platform to make a big difference and you aren’t.

item.title:
RT by @girlsonfilmldn: 🚨 Have a great idea for a book? You have 24 hours to submit your idea + a sample of your writing to us!
The winner will be published by #Merky Books, just like our 2019 winners Hafsa Zayyan + Monika Radojevic ✨
Submit before midnight Friday 30 October: https://www.penguin.co.uk/articles/2020/merky-books-new-writers-prize-application-form.html
item.dc:creator: @MerkyBooks
item.description:

item.title:

item.title:

item.title: R to @anya_reiss: This response is honestly not shocking as its one I have seen before. The gaslighting, the victim blaming, the blaming his behaviour on his own trauma. Framing it as a 'we' problem. I actually struggled to finish reading it.
item.dc:creator: @girlsonfilmldn
item.description: This response is honestly not shocking as its one I have seen before. The gaslighting, the victim blaming, the blaming his behaviour on his own trauma. Framing it as a 'we' problem. I actually struggled to finish reading it.
